data.title: PHYSICS MATTERS — Video
data.text:
Thursday, August 31, 2023

"Accelerator driven systems – a solution to multiple problems of society”

See Slides: [Slides_YuanHe_ADS]

See Also: "The perspectives of MYRRHA in contributing to solve the energy crisis" by Prof. Hamid Aït Abderrahim

Presented at APS April23 Session M06

Speaker: Prof. Yuan He, Director of Linac Center, Institute of Modern Physics, Chinese Academy of Sciences, CHINA

Thursday, February 23, 2023

“The I.FAST CBI: a challenge to engage students on the application of particle accelerators to the environment"

Description: [Description_CBI_Nicolas_Delerue]

This event was followed by a forum including:

Reema Atlamimi - I.FAST / CBI (PS, FR)

Messaoud Harfouche - SESAME (JO, DZ)

Juha Vierinen - University of Tromsø (NO, SE)

More Reading:

“I.FAST / CBI advert. :How can particle accelerators address environmental issues?"

[Slides_Nicolas_Delerue]

[Slides_Reema_Altamimi]

[Slides_Messaoud_Harfouhce]

[Slides_Juha_Vierinen]

Speakers: Nicolas Delerue ICJLab/IN2P3/CNRS (FR)

Thursday, July 15, 2021

The Music of Physics

See Slides: [Eliam_Gross]

See Also: Weizmann Nobel Laureate Prof. Ada Yonath explaining "How do intruders take over their hosts?" (SCIENTIFika event organized in collaboration with ESS, MAXIV on the basis of APS March meeting “Chat with the Experts”) Prof. Ada Yonath, Israeli crystallographer, received her Nobel Prize in Chemistry in 2009 for her pioneering work on the structure of the ribosome.

Description: [Description_Eliam_Gross]

Speakers: Eliam Gross Weizmann Institute of Science (Israel)

Tuesday, June 15, 2021

SESAME: The New Adventure of the Middle East Women Scientists

See Slides: [GihanKamel]

See Also:

Following the lecture, more insights are shared with a scientific expert panel composed of:

• Andrea Lausi, SESAME Scientific Director

• Ghaleb Natour, Central Institute of Engineering, Electronics and Analytics – Engineering and Technology (ZEA-1), Jülich, Director

• Bernard Amadei, UC Boulder and Engineers-without-Borders, President

• Zafra Lerman, Malta Conferences Foundation, President

• Joe Niemela, ICTP and FIP elected-Chair

• Alan Hurd, Los Alamos Laboratory and FIP Chair

• Christine Darve, ESS and FIP vice-Chair (organizer)

You can also support us by filling the 5 min survey: https://tinyurl.com/f6wbkcxh

Description: [Description_Gihan_Kamel]

Speakers: Gihan Kamel SESAME (Jordan)
